rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0001
rows.name:
Well then, my friends, shall we make
a move?

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0002
rows.name: Your Majesty...

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0003
rows.name:
This may not be my position to
say, but would it not be wise to first
investigate the location we spoke of?

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0004
rows.name: Ah, yes, you do raise a valid point...

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0005
rows.name:
Wadatsumi please consider
His Majesty's feeling

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0006
rows.name:
He wishes for quality time to spend
with his dear friend, Prince Adel.

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0007
rows.name:
I'm honored that you value me so
highly.

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0008
rows.name:
But I think this is a decision best left to
Hugo. What do you say? Would that be
getting in the way of your mission?

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0009
rows.name: No, no, not in the slightest!

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0010
rows.name:
In fact, I believe you are just as much
involved in this whole affair as us.

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0011
rows.name:
What with your traveling alongside
the Holy Grail, that much is clear.

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0012
rows.name:
So this mission of yours has
something to do with Metsu?

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0013
rows.name: Indeed. Wadatsumi, would you?

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0014
rows.name:
Of course. By official decree, allow
me to formally disclose to you the
nature of our mission.

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0015
rows.name:
On the surface, we have traveled here
to work on diffusing diplomatic tensions
between the Empire and Shiya.

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0016
rows.name:
But at the same time, there is another
matter we are investigating.

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0017
rows.name:
And that, I presume, is Metsu...
So, what are you going to do?
Take him down? Capture him?

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0018
rows.name: At the present time, neither.

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0019
rows.name:
It is His Majesty's wish to ascertain the
intent of this Malos, and indeed anyone
who wishes our empire harm.

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0020
rows.name:
...Then, I assume new intelligence
has come to light?

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0021
rows.name:
The 4th Decade reported in just as
you were on your way to Trigo.

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0022
rows.name:
They had discovered an area of land
that had been scorched black by some
colossal power.

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0023
rows.name:
I don't think Adel's going to want
to ignore that one.

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0024
rows.name: You read my mind.

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0025
rows.name:
Hugo, as much as I'd enjoy reminiscing
out on the Cloud Sea, I'd quite like to
enjoy some more of the scenery first.

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0026
rows.name: Of course.

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0027
rows.name:
If you like, we can take a side trip
before we return to the ship.

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0028
rows.name: Laura, is this wise..?

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0029
rows.name:
Everything will be fine.
Kasumi is with me after all

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0030
rows.name:
That's right. Please, take as much time
as you need.

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0031
rows.name: All right.

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0032
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]Maybe it's for the best that she
doesn't get to see the extent of
Metsu's devastation...

rows.label: fev11_210_175_msg0033
rows.name:
I still want to decorate the graves,
so I'll wait for you in the village.
